title: Seventh Annual European Literature Night 2025
description: An evening of readings and discussions with award-winning authors from 11 countries.

title: The Talented Mrs. Mandelbaum: The Rise and Fall of an American Organized-Crime Boss
description: Journalist Margalit Fox discusses her latest book about a criminal mastermind in Gilded Age New York.
address: NYPL’s Stavros Niarchos Foundation Library, Midtown

title: A Final Reading with the Center for Fiction / Susan Kamil 2024-2025 Emerging Writer Fellows
description: Emerging writer fellows share their published writing and works in progress.
address: The Center for Fiction, Fort Greene

title: Top Shelf Stories
description: An evening of storytelling featuring guests and an open mic slot for an audience member.

title: The Harlem Chamber Players: NYC Composers Concert
description: A concert celebrating the 400th anniversary of NYC with works by five composers.

title: Fifth Annual Francon
description: An annual tribute to writer Fran Lebowitz with themed drinks and a book exchange.

title: Kevin Geeks Out About John Carpenter
description: A multi-media variety show celebrating the films of John Carpenter.

title: Wunderkammer: A Taxidermy Showcase and Competition
description: Taxidermy artists showcase their creations at this unique annual event.

title: Misty Copeland’s Farewell Performance
description: Ballet legend Misty Copeland takes her final bow with American Ballet Theatre, honored with tributes from Oprah Winfrey and Debbie Allen. Free simulcast available.

title: Hitchcocktober at Angelika
description: Annual tribute to Alfred Hitchcock's films. Tonight's feature is 'Dial M for Murder' (1954).

title: An Evening with Creature Publishing
description: Indie horror press Creature Publishing hosts an evening featuring writers and a wine reception.

title: We Have Fun: A Stand-Up Show
description: Hosts Zach Sims and Dan Wilbur bring a night of stand-up comedy featuring various comedians.

title: The Moth Storyslam
description: Community-based open mic storytelling competition with the theme 'sacrifice'.

title: Friends with Caveats
description: A weekly comedy show featuring a variety of performances including stand-up and music.

title: Book Smart vs Street Smart: Uptown Showdown
description: A comedy clash where sharp-witted scholars face off against quick-thinking hustlers. Featuring notable guests like Ariel Dumas and Dave Hill.

title: CJ Leede’s American Rapture
description: Horror writer CJ Leede celebrates the paperback release of 'American Rapture' with a reading and discussion, followed by a screening of 'Zombieland'.
cost: $15 admission includes a store gift card, $19.99 ticket option includes a signed copy of the book.

title: Brooklyn Books + Booze
description: A monthly event featuring established and up-and-coming authors reading from their works. Tonight's lineup includes Matthew Kressel and C.W. Rose.
address: Barrow's Intense Tasting Room, Industry City

title: Astronomy on Tap: ‘Trick or Treat Telescope’ Edition
description: A night for astronomy enthusiasts with talks by professional scientists and themed games. Tonight features talks on Chilean telescopes and James Webb discoveries.

title: The Broad Squad
description: A monthly comedy variety show featuring a female-fronted lineup and tarot readings. Tonight's lineup includes Katie Compa and Meghan Hanley.

title: Live Band Karaoke at Arlene’s Grocery
description: Pick your song and perform with a live band backing you up. A fun night of karaoke awaits!

title: Sweet Comedy Show: ‘Sweet-ween’ Edition
description: Seth Herzog’s comedy show featuring guests like Janeane Garofalo and Adrian Martinez. A night of laughs and fun!

title: Hyperfocus: A Neurodivergent Comedy Show
description: A comedy show featuring neurodivergent comedians discussing their niche knowledge. Hosted by Virginia Dickens.
